resources.string: Clean current records and search again
Bluetooth low energy is not supported on this device. Try another one.
You have decided to delete all devices from list. Are you sure?
You have decided to delete all records from list. Are you sure?
Error occurred while enabling.Leaving the application..
" - notification disabled,\nuse the LONG CLICK to access all time logs of this beacon"
" - notification enabled,\nuse the LONG CLICK to access all time logs of this beacon"
" - playing audio disabled,\nuse the LONG CLICK to choose mp3 audio file"
" - playing audio enabled,\nuse the LONG CLICK to choose mp3 audio file"
BlueCapa service is running in background
Permission is granted to use bluetooth.
Permission is not granted so application will not work properly!
You can change the title with LONG CLICK on it
With LONG CLICK you can choose new image from gallery
SHORT CLICK restore all the swiped out cards (ignored beacons)\nLONG CLICK permanently removes all beacons cards
